snippet: A senior Pakistani diplomat said Friday that his government would release all Afghan Taliban prisoners in its custody, bolstering hopes for peace negotiations with the insurgents.
abstract: Senior Pakistani diplomat says his government will release all Afghan Taliban prisoners in Pakistan's custody, bolstering hopes for peace negotiations with insurgents.
lead_paragraph: A senior Pakistani diplomat said Friday that his government would release all Afghan Taliban prisoners in its custody, bolstering hopes for peace negotiations with the insurgents.

headline.seo: Pakistan: Taliban Prisoners to Be Freed
headline.main: Pakistan: Taliban Prisoners to Be Freed
headline.print_headline: Pakistan: Taliban Prisoners to Be Freed
